attributes.action: Make the "Race For Life" available to men aswell as women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition has been made for all men who want to raise money for cancer research. 

The race for life website says - "We restrict entry to women due to the wishes of our participants"


I believe that cancer research is missing an opportunity to almost double the fund raising. If you feel as strong as i do, please sign up now.

Thanks

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
